steaks.title: sirloin steak
steaks.description: Pan-Seared Steak with garlic butter is seared and caramelized on the outside and juicy inside.

steaks.title: pepper steak
steaks.description: Accompanied with either French fries, rice, mashed potatoes or potato wedges

steaks.title: mushroom steak
steaks.description: tender mushrooms in a rich and creamy garlic sauce come together as a perfect topping for juicy steaks!

steaks.title: cordon bleu
steaks.description: comfort food classic of crispy breadcrumb-crusted boneless, skinless chicken breasts wrapped around thinly sliced ham and melted cheese.

steaks.title: t-bone steak
steaks.description: juicy pan-seared T-Bone steak seasoned with savory steak seasoning, seared to perfection, then basted with a garlic herb butter!

steaks.title: lamb chops
steaks.description: Marinated in lemon, oregano, and loads of garlic, these lamb chops reach the ultimate level of flavor, and will make you look like a rockstar
